name: Paper Golf
description:
-- Paper Golf -- 
Embark on an epic adventure filled with slimes, dragons, and GOLF! Play through 18 holes and prove yourself to the world of papercraft.

This game was created for the "960 x 144 in Stop Motion" Game Jam. That explains the weird resolution.

-- Controls --
Spacebar, press it, hold it, release it, feel it!

-- Know Issues --
(FIXED) Hola 18 - The final boss can kill you even after you won.
(FIXED) Hole 3 - The first enemy started with only 2 points of health instead of 3.

-- Updates --
- Moved the character slighty to the right. Some holes have been adjusted accordingly.
- Hole 9 is now hole 8 an viceversa.
